content: You know, I've been thinking about musicals a lot lately, and I just realized that I ended up watching "Hamilton" twice in one week after I finally got to see it on Disney+. I was blown away by the musical numbers and the story, and I even convinced my family to watch it with me the second time around. Have you heard about any other new musicals or productions that are coming up? I'd love to stay on top of what's new and exciting in the world of musical theatre!
